external_games.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog MP002

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Break the Fog MP002
summary: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Break The Fog is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 002.
